start_body: Welcome! Pick a category below to explore developer utilities.
help: How to use the bot Use /tools or the home menu to pick a category. Each tool walks you through providing input and returns the processed result. Send /recent at any time to revisit your latest actions.
about: About DevToys Tools Bot brings a curated set of converters, formatters, validators, and generators inspired by the DevToys desktop app. Everything runs securely in the cloud so you can work from any device.
privacy: Privacy Inputs are processed transiently and stored only long enough to deliver results. Temporary files are kept in your private workspace and are purged automatically. See /settings for personal preferences.
recent_empty: You have not run any tasks yet.
cancelled: Okay, I cancelled the current action.
